item_leather_cap.name: leather cap
item_leather_cap.description: A simple cap made of hardened leather. Offers basic head protection.

item_leather_tunic.name: leather tunic
item_leather_tunic.description: A tunic crafted from thick, boiled leather panels sewn together.

item_leather_gloves.name: leather gloves
item_leather_gloves.description: Simple gloves made from tough leather.

item_leather_boots.name: leather boots
item_leather_boots.description: Sturdy boots made of thick leather, suitable for adventuring.

item_padded_tunic.name: padded tunic
item_padded_tunic.description: A cloth tunic reinforced with layers of thick padding sewn inside.
